intro: Randia sumatrana, commonly known as the Sumatran randia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, opposite leaves and clusters of small, white or pinkish flowers. It produces small, spherical berries that are typically red when mature. Randia sumatrana is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, growing in moist, shaded environments.
